doc.title: Freedom Is Family: A Journey of Meaning
doc.plot: This project traces the lives of a Cambodian refugee and her two sisters who fled from the Khmer Rouge but were separated. Hoang Taing, a woman who achieved the "American Dream" shares her experiences in the Killing Fields as a sought out motivational speaker. However she has always searched for meaning of her identity as it was lost with her sisters. Experience their reunion and the continued journey of building new lives with extended families, children, and most intriguingly, secrets that come out of hiding after so many years.
